ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 130
ygData.msgSnippet: I sure hope they introduce some new books, with part prices like the ones you mentioned luke.  And I m also sorely disapointed to hear that the collapsable
ygData.messageBody:
I sure hope they introduce some new books, with part prices like the ones
you mentioned luke. And I'm also sorely disapointed to hear that the
collapsable fishing pole breaks, I thought it being unbreakable would be
its one saving grace. =(

Since Verant seems to be working on tinkering skill, now would probably be
a prime time to slip them a little note about the pole and ask that it be
made unbreakable, so that people will want to buy it.

The last time I tried to get a hold of someone in Verant was when I sent in
the tinkering petition that had about 400 some signatures on it, I sent
copies to Smedley and Brad but never got any feedback. Not even a note
saying, "Thanks, I'll foward this to the right guy". Kind of thing.

But I was able to get feedback from GZ (The guy who does the spells).

His email address is gzatkin@...

I sure if people emailed him a NICE POLITE and SHORT letter concerning the
collapsable pole breaking, and ask him to forward this to the trade skills
person to look at, I'm sure he would help.

In fact, I think I'm gonna send him a email right now, and I hope everyone
else will be able to too.

- Rotgut
